can_be_synced = True

    
    fullpath = os.path.join(os.environ["HOME"], path)

    
    
    
    library_path = os.path.join(os.environ["HOME"], "Library/")

    if platform.system() == constants.PLATFORM_LINUX:
        if fullpath.startswith(library_path):
            can_be_synced = False

    return can_be_synced
